mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_COMMENT ( COMMENT_ID, TARGET_TYPE, TARGET_ID, USER_ID, COMMENT_TEXT, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_COMMENT_ID.NEXTVAL, #{targetType}, #{targetId}, #{userId}, #{commentText}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMMENT_ID, C.TARGET_TYPE, C.TARGET_ID, C.USER_ID, C.COMMENT_TEXT, C.CREATE_DATE, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM TB_COMMENT C LEFT JOIN TB_USER U ON C.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE C.TARGET_TYPE = #{targetType} AND C. TARGET_ID = #{targetId} ORDER BY C.CREATE_DATE DESC
